name: Assassin's Creed II: The Battle of Forli
name_original: Assassin's Creed II: The Battle of Forli
description: Battle of Forli is the first DLC pack for Assassin's Creed 2. It features the first corrupted memory sequence from the Animus and is set towards the end of its base game. The city of Forli is under attack and Ezio must help Caterina Sforza, whom he briefly met in Assassin's Creed II, and Niccolo Machiavelli to defend it.
